snippet: The Prospect Theater Company’s revamped version of Adam Guettel’s “Myths and Hymns” has the potential to convince theaters everywhere that the piece is viable as a stage property.
abstract: Prospect Theater Company’s revamped version of Adam Guettel’s song cycle Myths and Hymns has the potential to convince theaters everywhere that the piece is viable as a stage property; Guettel, grandson of Richard Rodgers, is currently working on four productions.
lead_paragraph: The Prospect Theater Company’s revamped version of Adam Guettel’s “Myths and Hymns” has the potential to convince theaters everywhere that the piece is viable as a stage property.

headline.main: In Its Next Life a Song Cycle Is a Musical
headline.print_headline: In Its Next Life a Song Cycle Is a Musical
